DataElement.preferredName: Person Measured Total Pregnancy Weight Gain Weight Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A human being._Having been determined by measurement._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth._The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity._Gain; to increase or the amount of increase._The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
